Banner.Title: Discover digital art and Collect NFTs

CreateNft.Description: Choose “Single” for one of a kind or “Multiple” if you want to sell one collectible multiple times

Single.Title: Single Item
Single.Description: If you want to highlight the uniqueness and individuality of your item

Mutiple.Title: Multiple Editions
Mutiple.Description: If you want to share your NFT with a large number of community members
